target.name: local:drupal:install
target.description: Installs a specific Drupal site using local drush alias.

target.name: local:refresh:all
target.description: Refreshes all local environment from upstream testing database.

target.name: local:refresh:site
target.description: Refreshes local environment from upstream testing database.

target.name: local:setup
target.description: Install dependencies, builds docroot, installs Drupal; uses local drush alias.

target.name: local:sync:all
target.description: Synchronize each local environment from remote (remote --> local).

target.name: local:sync:site
target.description: Synchronize a local environment from remote (remote --> local).

target.name: local:sync
target.description: Does the work of synchronizing local environment from remote (remote --> local).

target.name: local:update
target.description: Update current database to reflect the state of the Drupal file system; uses local drush alias.
